definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

blind people touch an elephant (idiom, from Nirvana sutra 大般涅槃經|大般涅盘经[da4 ban1 Nie4 pan2 jing1]); fig. unable to see the big picture/to mistake the part for the whole/unable to see the wood for the trees
Bolshoi Ussuriisk Island in the Heilongjiang or Amur river, at mouth of the Ussuri River opposite Khabarovsk/Heixiazi (black blind man) Island

sentences.english: Who Am Iand To Be Blind?
They want to know whether they bump into unhealthy environmental influences that cause disease, pressing a directive to seek old a blind person then.
sentences.chinese: 她们想知道自己是否撞邪，于是按着指示去找陈瞎子。

sentences.english: To change water into wine to heal the lepers and the blind...
sentences.chinese: 至于把水变成酒，治好麻风病和瞎子，他愿意干就干。

sentences.english: At midday you will grope about like a blind man in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 你必在午间摸索，好像瞎子在暗中摸索一样。

sentences.english: The LORD openeth the eyes of the blind: the LORD raiseth them that are bowed down: the LORD loveth the righteous
sentences.chinese: 耶和华开了瞎子的眼睛。

sentences.english: He took the blind man by the hand and led him outside the village.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣拉着瞎子的手，领他到村外。

sentences.english: He saw the blind man and a look of fear passed across his face.
sentences.chinese: 老船长看见了瞎子，脸上充满了恐惧。

sentences.english: He restored sight to the blind.
When the decisive goal is waived offside by another incorrect lines-blind.
sentences.chinese: 当一个决定性的进球被另一个瞎子吹成了越位。

sentences.english: Can a devil open the eyes of the blind?
sentences.chinese: 鬼岂能叫瞎子的眼睛开了呢。

sentences.english: Now if there is blind man who wishes buy pair sunglasses, how should express himself?
sentences.chinese: 现如果瞎子想买副太阳眼镜，如何表达？

sentences.english: No one under the guidance of all blind elephant.
sentences.chinese: 没有人来指导下，一切都是瞎子摸象。

sentences.english: Art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind, a light of them that are in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 又深信自己是瞎子的响导，是黑暗中人的光明。

sentences.english: Wherefore they said, The blind and the lame shall not come into the house.
sentences.chinese: 从此有俗语说，在那里有瞎子，瘸子，他不能进屋去。

sentences.english: 35As Jesus approached Jericho, a blind man was sitting by the roadside begging.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣将近耶利哥的时候，有一个瞎子坐在路旁讨饭。

sentences.english: As far as Jieyu's experience is concerned, you are blind and deaf.
sentences.chinese: 在接舆的经验层面上，你就是个瞎子，就是聋子。
